editedFacts.appliances: Dishwasher, Freezer, Microwave, Range / Oven, Refrigerator

response.homeDescription: Stunning River views and Breath Taking Sunsets! This stunning and spacious Alcove Loft with river views10ft ceilings, and high-end finishes in a full-service luxury building located in the heart of the Financial District. The apartment features: A chef's dream kitchen with Viking appliances, a Sub-Zero refrigerator, and a dual-drawer Fisher & Paykel dishwasher. Retreat to a bathroom oasis and bathe in the deep-soaking Kohler tub. Both the kitchen and bathroom are equipped with an in-wall multi-speaker iPod docking station. Host fabulous parties in the resident sky lounge amidst the most picturesque river and park views! Transportation: Fulton Transit Center, New Jersey Path, Main Subway Lines (1,2,3,4,5,R,W,J,M,Z) and Future JFK shuttle Retail Near By: Tiffany's, Hermes, Godiva, Thomas Pink, Delmonico's, Haru, The South Street Seaport Piers and Shopping Mall, Stone Street European Style Restaurant and Bars (out door dining 6 months of the year) , World Financial Center Docks and Shops
